teststorydesc: A patient is seen at a clinic. A new administration is recorded. The IIS is able to process the administration message but finds multiple soft errors (warnings) which it returns in the acknowledgement message.
postCondition: The returned error must be visible in the EHR.
testObjectives: This test case assesses the ability of the EHR to accept an acknowledgement message with multiple soft errors being returned by the IIS.
